title: a
description:
About the job
GoFormz is a San Diego-based startup leading the mobile data capture industry. We empower businesses to replace paper forms with web and mobile-based digital forms that provide global access to the collected data. We are currently looking for a solution focused Azure AI Engineer to add to our growing team. We do everything from modern React apps to cross-platform mobile app development to extensive API development in a microservices architecture.


As an Azure AI Engineer, you will collaborate closely with a cross-functional team of engineers and technical product managers to enhance our platform with AI-powered features, transforming how our customers engage with our services. In this role, you will develop and integrate Azure AI services into our existing applications, making a tangible impact on the customer experience. You will be a key contributor to production code, and the solutions you build will become an integral part of the daily lives of thousands of our customers.


Responsibilities:
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Design, develop, deploy, and support Azure AI software components 
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Monitor, maintain, and optimize AI applications for performance and scalability.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Integrate AI capabilities into applications, leveraging Azure AI Services
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Coordinate with stakeholders to align AI solutions with organizational goals.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Staying up to date on AI trends and ethical considerations, such as data privacy and mitigating bias in AI systems
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Develop and maintain microservice APIs using C# and .Net
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Develop and maintain our front-end React application
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Develop and maintain our cross-platform MAUI mobile apps
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Participate in weekly releases
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Mentor junior software developers by advocating for best practices.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Perform code reviews
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Meet weekly with team to discuss ongoing projects
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Extend and document changes to existing subsystems as needed
 
Requirements:
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	6+ years of experience
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	C# / .NET
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	RESTful APIs
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	SQL and/or non-relational databases
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Hands-on experience with Azure AI services (Search, Vision, Speech, Vision, and Docs).
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Familiarity with the latest trends in AI and machine learning.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience with large language models (LLMs) and vector databases
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Knowledge of data governance, security, and AI compliance standards in Azure.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience with microservice architecture
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience working in an Agile environment
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Expertise in building secure, scalable, enterprise systems
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Strong communication skills for explaining AI concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


Nice to Have:
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Azure AI Certification(s)
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience with Microsoft Fabric, Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Analytics.
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Azure Functions / Service Bus / Event Hubs
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	CI/CD pipelines - Azure DevOps
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	NoSQL Databases - MongoDB & Cosmos
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Dapper ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ or other microORM
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	React - or other modern JavaScript framework
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	SQL - or other relational database
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Docker, Kubernetes, or Container Apps
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience with Azure Application Insights
ÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂ¢	Experience with database schema design and query optimization

GoFormz is a San Diego-based startup leading the mobile data capture industry. We empower businesses to replace paper forms with web and mobile-based digital forms that provide global access to the collected data. We are currently looking for a solution focused Azure AI Engineer to add to our growing team. We do everything from modern React apps to cross-platform mobile app development to extensive API development in a microservices architecture.


As an Azure AI Engineer, you will collaborate closely with a cross-functional team of engineers and technical product managers to enhance our platform with AI-powered features, transforming how our customers engage with our services. In this role, you will develop and integrate Azure AI services into our existing applications, making a tangible impact on the customer experience. You will be a key contributor to production code, and the solutions you build will become an integral part of the daily lives of thousands of our customers.
